alert.note: Alert for Bannock; Cassia; Power (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 24 at 2:50PM MDT until May 24 at 3:30PM MDT by NWS Pocatello
info.description: The National Weather Service in Pocatello has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Bannock County in southeastern Idaho... Southeastern Power County in southeastern Idaho... Eastern Cassia County in southeastern Idaho... * Until 330 PM MDT. * At 249 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Rockland, or 14 miles south of Neeley, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Rockland, Fort Hall Bannock Peak and Pauline. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
